name: Cody Carlson
body:
### Welcome to My Portfolio!
Hi! My name is Cody Carlson. I'm currently a student at Champlain College in Burlington VT, working on my Bachelor's of Science in Electronic Game Programming. I am super passionate about developing fun and innovative games and sharing them with the world. Here on my portfolio you can find some example projects I have worked on over the years. I hope you enjoy exploring!

### Contact Me
Any questions or suggestions? Email me at [cody@carlsonhome.org](cody@carlsonhome.org)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
